name: Bacter.io Evolution
description:
Survival of the fittest — test this basic principle of evolution in microworld. Discover all the perks of being a tiny bacterium in this life simulation game. Move around the field, pick up pieces of food, hunt other bacteria and become the most powerful microorganism!

GROW AND EVOLVE
- find food to become bigger
- fight and eat your enemies to evolve

DEVELOP YOUR SKILLS
- health — to fight longer
- speed — to move faster
- strength — to hit harder

USE EXTRA HELP
- power ups
- skill boosts
- daily bonuses

CONQUER THE MICROWORLD
- become the biggest bacterium
- get to the top of the food pyramid

The surviving game Bacter.io Evolution: eat or be eaten. Choose your own path of evolution and fight for your survival!
